dict.string: This describes how my app uses Odometer data.
This describes how my app uses Wrist temperature data.
This describes how my app uses frequent visits data.
This describes how my app uses telephony and siri speech data.
This describes how my app uses wrist detection data.
This describes how my app uses photoplethysmogram data.
This describes how my app uses amount of time that the user is on phone calls data.
This describes how my app uses steps data.
This describes how my app uses information about use of the Messages app data.
This describes how my app uses information about interactions with media, such as images and videos, in messaging apps data.
This describes how my app uses heart rate data.
This describes how my app uses information about keyboard usage data.
This describes how my app uses face data.
This describes how my app uses streams sample ECG sensor data.
This describes how my app uses information about device usage data.
This describes how my app uses pressure and temperature metrics data.
This describes how my app uses ambient light information data.
This describes how my app uses acceleration and rotation motion data.
To calculate the velocity speed of the running device we need access to the location when app in use
To calculate the velocity speed of the running device when app is in background we need access to the location always
